channel.title: Daily Feed (Updated 9 AM BD)
channel.description: Daily Feed (Updated 9 AM BD) generated by script

item.title: The right-to-repair fight could make or break US troops’ robot-war plans
item.description: Contracts that prevent battlefield repair, mods are hindering troops’ lethality, operators and experts say.

item.title: Time Machine: When Putin Warned Bush About Dangers of Regime Change
item.description: Irony abounds in newly unearthed telephone call on eve of US invasion of Iraq that records Putin warning Bush about violating UN charter and “international law.”
